legendaryGroup.name: Aboleth
lairActions: 當底棲魔魚在其巢穴戰鬥時，它可以引發周圍環境的魔法以採取它的巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），底棲魔魚可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 底棲魔魚對距離它60呎內且它所能看見的任意數量個生物施放{@spell 魅影之力}(無須任何構材)。當專注於這個效果時，底棲魔魚不能採取其它的巢穴動作。 若目標成功通過此豁免檢定，或這個效果對它的影響結束，則目標將在接下來24小時內免疫於該底棲魔魚使用巢穴動作施放的{@spell 魅影之力}，然而該生物仍然可以選擇自願被影響。
距離底棲魔魚90呎內的水池將化作洶湧的攫抓浪潮向外湧出。任何在地面上且距離這類水池20呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 14的力量豁免，否則被拉向水中最多20呎距離且被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。直到底棲魔魚使用了另一個巢穴動作之前，它都不能再使用此巢穴動作。
底棲魔魚巢穴內的水體將被魔法變成生物狂怒的導管。底棲魔魚可以選擇任意個距離它90呎內，它所能看見，且處於這類水體中的生物做為目標。目標必須成功通過一次DC 14的睿知豁免，否則受到 7 ({@dice 2d6})精神傷害。直到底棲魔魚使用了另一個巢穴動作之前，它都不能再使用此巢穴動作。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著底棲魔魚巢穴的區域被該生物的本質所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離底棲魔魚巢穴1哩內的地底表面將變為黏滑而潮濕的困難地形。
距離巢穴1哩內的水源被超自然力量汙染。底棲魔魚的敵人在喝下這樣的水後將反胃長達數分鐘。

以一個動作，底棲魔魚可以在它巢穴1哩內創造一個自己的幻影。這個幻影可以出現在任何底棲魔魚曾經見過的地方，或在任何被底棲魔魚{@condition 魅惑}的生物當下所能看見的地方。一旦幻影被創造，只要底棲魔魚維持專注（如同專注於法術），這個幻影就將持續存在。儘管這個幻影沒有實體，但它的外觀、聲音，以及移動方式都跟底棲魔魚一樣。底棲魔魚可以透過該幻影的位置感知、說話、並使用它的心靈感應，就如同它存在於該處一樣。若這個幻影受到任何傷害，則它將消失。

regionalEffects: 若底棲魔魚死亡，前兩個效應將在{@dice 3d10}天內逐漸消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Aerisi Kalinoth
lairActions: 當阿莉希位於大氣節點，而{@creature Yan-C-Bin|PotA|延希賓}不在該處時，阿莉希將可以採取巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），阿莉希可以採取一次巢穴動作以施放她的其中一個法術，最高3環，且無須使用任何構材或法術位。她不能連續兩輪施放相同的法術，但她可以持續專注於她之前使用巢穴動作所施放的法術。當阿莉希專注於她以巢穴動作施放的法術時，她將無法採取巢穴動作。
若阿莉希使用這個巢穴動作以施放{@spell 隱形術}，她將同時汲取大氣節點中的能量。這麼做能夠讓她回復 15 ({@dice 3d8+2})點生命值。

legendaryGroup.name: Baphomet
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Baphomet can take a lair action to cause one of the following magical effects; he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Baphomet seals one doorway or other entryway within the lair. The opening must be unoccupied. It is filled with solid stone for 1 minute or until Baphomet creates this effect again.

Baphomet chooses a room within the lair that is no larger in any dimension than 100 feet. Until the next initiative count 20, gravity is reversed within that room. Any creatures or objects in the room when this happens fall in the direction of the new pull of gravity, unless they have some means of remaining aloft. Baphomet can ignore the gravity reversal if he's in the room, although he likes to use this action to land on a ceiling to attack targets dying near it.
Baphomet casts {@spell mirage arcane}, affecting a room within the lair that is no longer in any dimension than 100 feet. The effect ends on the next initiative count 20.

regionalEffects: The region containing Baphomet's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Plant life within 1 mile of the lair grows thick and forms walls of trees, hedges, and other flora in the form of small mazes.
Beasts within 1 mile of the lair become frightened and disoriented, as though constantly under threat of being hunted, and might lash out or panic even when no visible threat is nearby.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Baphomet table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Baphomet dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Baphomet
entries: If a creature goes mad in Baphomet's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Baphomet table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Baphomet
rows: "My anger consumes me. I can't be reasoned with when my rage has been stoked."
"I degenerate into beastly behavior, seeming more like a wild animal than a thinking being."
"The world is my hunting ground. Others are my prey."
"Hate comes easily to me and explodes into rage."
"I see those who oppose me not as people, but as beasts meant to be preyed upon."

legendaryGroup.name: Beholder
lairActions: 當眼魔在其巢穴戰鬥時，它可以引發周圍環境的魔法以採取它的巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），眼魔可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 距離眼魔120呎內一處50呎平方的地表範圍將變得黏滑；該區域被變為困難地形直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。
距離眼魔120呎內的牆面將長出攫抓觸肢，持續直到下一輪之後，先攻順序再次輪到20。每個眼魔所選，且在這類牆面10呎內開始它回合的生物，都必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則將{@condition 被擒}。從中逃脫需要成功通過一次DC 15的力量（{@skill 運動}）或敏捷（{@skill 特技}）檢定。
距離眼魔60呎內的一處固體表面將張開一隻眼睛。一道眼魔的隨機眼波射線將從這隻眼睛射向一個眼魔所選擇且它所能看見的生物。這隻眼睛接著將閉上並消失。

lairActions: 在所有的效果都被使用過之前，眼魔不能使用已經用過的巢穴動作效果，且眼魔不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果。
regionalEffects: 這片坐落著眼魔巢穴的區域被該生物的非自然本質所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離眼魔巢穴1哩內的生物偶爾會感覺到自己正在被注視，儘管實際上並沒有這回事。
當眼魔入睡時，輕微的現實扭曲將會發生在距離它巢穴1哩內的區域，並接著在24小時後消失。這些扭曲可能會是雕刻牆面上記號的微妙變化、怪異的飾品出現在它們先前不存在的地方、無害的黏液覆蓋於雕像表面，諸如此類。這些效應只會發生在自然表面和不屬於任何人的非魔法物體上。

regionalEffects: 若眼魔死亡，這些效應都將在{@dice 1d10}天內逐漸消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Black Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），黑龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；黑龍不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 距離黑龍120呎內且它所能看見的水池湧起一陣卷人的浪潮。任何距離這個水池20呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的力量豁免，否則被拖向水池最多20呎距離並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

黑龍選擇距離它120呎內的一點，一團成群的昆蟲雲霧充斥在以該點為中心的20呎半徑球體範圍內。這團蟲雲會繞過轉角蔓延，且會持續存在直到黑龍以一個動作驅散它們、再次使用這個巢穴動作，或黑龍死亡。這團蟲雲所在的區域被輕度遮蔽。任何在這團蟲雲出現時位於該區域內的生物必須進行一次DC 15的體質豁免，若豁免失敗則受到10 ({@dice 3d6})穿刺傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。一個在蟲雲內結束它回合的生物將受到10 ({@dice 3d6})穿刺傷害。
魔法黑暗從距離黑龍120呎內由它所選擇的一點蔓延，充斥在15呎半徑的球體範圍內直到黑龍以一個動作驅散它、再次使用這個巢穴動作，或黑龍死亡。這片黑暗會繞過轉角。一個擁有黑暗視覺的生物無法看透這片黑暗，且非魔法光源也無法照亮它。若這個效果範圍內的任何一個區域與其他2環或更低的法術所創造的光照重疊，則創造該光照的法術將被解消。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇黑龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離巢穴6哩內的陸地因為生長得茂密變形的植被，以及沼澤內滿佈的惡臭淤泥，而使得橫越所需的時間變為原本的兩倍。
距離巢穴1哩內的水源被超自然力量汙染。黑龍的敵人在喝下這樣的水後將反胃長達數分鐘。
距離巢穴6哩內的陸地將被霧氣給輕度遮蔽。

regionalEffects: 若黑龍死亡，這片區域內的植被將維持它們生長的情況，但其他效果將在{@dice 1d10}天後消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Blue Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），藍龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；藍龍不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 距離藍龍120呎內且它所能看見的一個生物上方一部分的天花板坍塌下來。該生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則受到10 ({@dice 3d6})鈍擊傷害，被擊倒{@condition 伏地}並被掩埋。被掩埋的目標將被{@condition 束縛}且無法呼吸或起身。一個生物可以採取一個動作以進行一次DC 10的力量檢定，成功則終止被掩埋的狀態。
一團沙塵旋轉卷起的雲團將以距離藍龍120呎內且它所能看見的一點為中心形成一個20呎半徑的球體區域。這團沙雲會繞過轉角。每個在這團沙雲內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 目盲}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。
閃電弧光在巢穴內藍龍所能看見的兩個固態表面之間形成一道5呎寬的直線區域。這兩個表面必須距離藍龍120呎內，且彼此相距120呎內。每個在直線區域內的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則受到10 ({@dice 3d6})閃電傷害。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇藍龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離巢穴6哩內的區域肆虐著雷鳴風暴。
距離巢穴6哩內的區域被塵捲風席捲著。塵捲風具有{@creature 氣元素}的數據，但它不會飛，具有50呎的移動速度，且智力和魅力只有1(-5)。
隱藏的陷落沙坑將在藍龍的巢穴內和巢穴周遭成形。透過成功通過一次DC 20的睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定可以在安全距離外發現一個隱藏的陷落沙坑。除此之外，第一個踩上陷落沙坑上覆蓋的稀薄沙層的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則將跌入陷落沙坑並墜落{@dice 1d6 × 10}呎的距離。

regionalEffects: 若藍龍死亡，塵捲風將會立刻消失，且雷鳴風暴將在{@dice 1d10}天內消散。任何陷落沙坑都會維持它們所在的位置。

legendaryGroup.name: Brass Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），黃銅龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 一股強風呼嘯環繞在黃銅龍的周圍。每個距離黃銅龍60尺內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的力量豁免，否則被推離黃銅龍15呎距離並被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。氣體和蒸氣都將被這股風吹散，且不受保護的火焰也將被熄滅。受保護的火焰；例如提燈，將有50%的機率被熄滅。
一團沙塵旋轉卷起的雲團將以距離黃銅龍120呎內且它所能看見的一點為中心形成一個20呎半徑的球體區域。這團沙雲會繞過轉角。每個在這團沙雲內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 目盲}長達1分鐘。一個生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇黃銅龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離巢穴6哩內的沙地上出現數條小徑。這些小徑通往安全的避難所和隱蔽的水源處，同時也會引領其遠離黃銅龍不希望被打擾的區域。
距離巢穴1哩內的沙漠中遊蕩著體型為大型或更小的怪物幻影。這些幻象可以移動且看起來非常真實，但它們無法造成傷害。一個檢視這些幻影的生物可以藉由成功通過一次DC 20的智力（{@skill 調查}）檢定以辨識出其是否為幻象。由於東西會穿過幻影，任何與幻影的物理性互動都將暴露它是幻象的事實。
每當一個擁有3點或更高智力值的生物來到距離巢穴1哩內的水源處的30呎範圍內，黃銅龍將會意識到該生物的存在與位置。

regionalEffects: 若黃銅龍死亡，小徑將會在{@dice 1d10}天內消散，而其他效應則會立即消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Bronze Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），青銅龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 青銅龍如同施放{@spell 雲霧術}法術一樣創造出一陣濃霧。這陣濃霧會持續存在直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。
一道雷鳴巨響以距離青銅龍120呎內且它所能看見的一點為源頭發出。每個在以該點為中心的20呎半徑範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則受到5 ({@dice 1d10})雷鳴傷害，且陷入{@condition 耳聾}狀態直到它的下個回合結束。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇青銅龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 每天一次，青銅龍可以改變以它巢穴為中心的6哩半徑內區域的天氣。青銅龍並不需要在戶外；除此之外，此效應的效果與{@spell 操控天氣}法術相同。
距離巢穴6哩內區域中的水中植物都呈現出耀眼炫目的色澤。
在青銅龍的巢穴內，它可以設置幻象聲響，例如輕柔的音樂和詭異的迴聲，並讓它們可以在巢穴中的各個位置被聽見。

regionalEffects: 若青銅龍死亡，被改變的天氣將如法術詳述中所記載的方式回復正常，且其他效應將在{@dice 1d10}天內逐漸消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Copper Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），赤銅龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 赤銅龍選擇距離它120呎內且它所能看見地面上的一點。岩石棘刺將在以該點為中心的20呎半徑區域中從地面長出。除此之外，這個效果與{@spell 荊棘叢生}法術相同，且它將持續存在直到赤銅龍再次使用這個巢穴動作、或直到赤銅龍死亡。

赤銅龍選擇距離它120呎內且它所能看見地面上的一處10呎邊長的方形區域。這個區域內的地面將轉變為3呎深的淤泥。每個在淤泥出現時位於該區域地面上的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則將沉入淤泥並陷入{@condition 束縛}。一個生物可以採取一個動作以嘗試進行一次DC 15的力量檢定，若成功則將它自己或另一個在它觸及範圍內的生物從淤泥中逃脫，終止其{@condition 束縛}狀態。在淤泥中移動1呎距離將會消耗2呎的移動速度。在下一輪的先攻順序輪到20時，淤泥將會硬化，且嘗試從中逃脫的力量檢定DC將增加至20。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇赤銅龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離巢穴6哩內區域中的岩石地形和物體上都可以看見用魔法雕刻出的微笑龍族臉龐。
原本不會說話的微型野獸，像是囓齒動物和鳥類，將在處於巢穴1哩內區域中時會獲得能夠說並理解龍語的魔法能力。這些生物會說赤銅龍的好話，但不會洩漏它的所在。
距離巢穴1哩內的智能生物會輕易的咯咯發笑。即使是嚴肅的事情也會頓時變得有趣起來。

regionalEffects: 若赤銅龍死亡，魔法浮雕將會在{@dice 1d10}天內逐漸消散。其他效應將會立即終止。

legendaryGroup.name: Death Tyrant
lairActions: 當亡眼暴君在其巢穴戰鬥時，它可以引發周圍環境的魔法以採取它的巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），亡眼暴君可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 距離亡眼暴君120呎內一處50呎平方的區域將充滿幽靈般的眼珠和觸手。對亡眼暴君以外的生物而言，該區域被輕度遮蔽，且變為困難地形直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。
牆面將長出幽靈般的觸肢，持續直到下一輪之後，先攻順序再次輪到20。任何敵對於亡眼暴君且在牆面10呎內開始它回合的生物（包括位於乙太位面的生物），都必須成功通過一次DC 17的敏捷豁免，否則將{@condition 被擒}。從中逃脫需要成功通過一次DC 17的力量（{@skill 運動}）或敏捷（{@skill 特技}）檢定。
距離亡眼暴君50呎內的空中一點將張開一顆幽靈般的眼睛。一道亡眼暴君的隨機眼波射線將從這顆眼睛（被視作源自乙太位面）射向一個亡眼暴君所選擇的目標。這隻眼睛接著將閉上並消失。

lairActions: 在所有的效果都被使用過之前，亡眼暴君不能使用已經用過的巢穴動作效果，且亡眼暴君不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果。
regionalEffects: 這片坐落著亡眼暴君巢穴的區域被該生物的非自然本質所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離亡眼暴君巢穴1哩內的生物偶爾會感覺到自己正在被注視，儘管實際上並沒有這回事。
當一個敵對於亡眼暴君並意識到其存在的生物在距離亡眼暴君巢穴1哩內的區域完成一次長休，則為該生物骰一顆{@dice d20}。若擲骰結果為10或更低，該生物將受到亡眼暴君一種隨機眼波射線的效果。

regionalEffects: 若亡眼暴君死亡，這些效應都將在{@dice 1d10}天內逐漸消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Demilich
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），半巫妖骰一顆{@dice d20}。若結果為11或更高，則半巫妖可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果。它不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 整座陵墓將劇烈震動片刻。每個在陵墓中的地面上的生物必須成功通過一次DC 19的敏捷豁免，否則將被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。
半巫妖選擇一個距離它60呎內且它所能看見的生物做為目標。一道{@spell 反魔法結界}將充斥於目標所在的空間並隨著它移動，持續直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。
半巫妖選擇任意個距離它30呎內且它所能看見的生物做為目標。直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20，這些目標都無法回復生命值。

regionalEffects: 半巫妖的陵墓可能會具有以下任意或全部的效應：

items: 當一個非邪惡的生物第一次進入陵墓區域時，該生物將受到16 ({@dice 3d10})死靈傷害。
陵墓中的怪物在對抗不被{@condition 魅惑}或{@condition 恐懼}，以及對抗驅散不死效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。
陵墓將防止那些未經半巫妖許可的生物所進行的魔法旅行。這類生物無法傳送或使用位面旅行進入或離開陵墓區域。在陵墓區域內傳送或位面旅行的效果將正常運作，只要它們不被用來離開或進入陵墓區域。

regionalEffects: 若半巫妖被摧毀，這些效應都將在10天內逐漸消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Demogorgon
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Demogorgon can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: Demogorgon can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Demogorgon creates an illusory duplicate of himself, which appears in his own space and lasts until initiative count 20 of the next round. On his turn, Demogorgon can move the illusory duplicate a distance equal to his walking speed (no action required). The first time a creature or object interacts physically with Demogorgon (for example, hitting him with an attack), there is a 50 percent chance that it is the illusory duplicate that is being affected, not Demogorgon himself, in which case the illusion disappears.

Demogorgon casts the {@spell darkness} spell four times at its lowest level, targeting different areas with the spell. Demogorgon doesn't need to concentrate on the spells, which end on initiative count 20 of the next round.

regionalEffects: The region containing Demogorgon's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: The area within 6 miles of the lair becomes overpopulated with lizards, poisonous snakes, and other venomous beasts.
Beasts within 1 mile of the lair become violent and crazed-even creatures that are normally docile.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Demogorgon table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Demogorgon dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Demogorgon
entries: If a creature goes mad in Demogorgon's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Demogorgon table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Demogorgon
rows: "Someone is plotting to kill me. I need to strike first to stop them!"
"There is only one solution to my problems: kill them all!"
"There is more than one mind inside my head."
"If you don't agree with me, I'll beat you into submission to get my way."
"I can't allow anyone to touch anything that belongs to me. They might try to take it away from me!"

legendaryGroup.name: Elder Brain
lairActions: 當在其巢穴戰鬥時，主腦可以使用它的巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），主腦可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；主腦不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 主腦施放{@spell 力牆術}法術。
主腦選擇一個距離它120呎內且它所能感知到的友善生物做為目標。目標將獲得一閃而過激勵，並在它的下個回合結束之前的一次攻擊檢定、屬性檢定、或豁免檢定中獲得優勢。若目標在時間內沒有使用或無法使用這個好處，則這個激勵將會消失。
主腦選擇一個距離它120呎內且它所能感知到的生物做為目標，並用純粹的意志力量將其固定住。目標必須成功通過一次DC 18的魅力豁免，否則將無法離開它當前所在的空間。目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。

regionalEffects: 距離主腦5呎內的土地都被該生物的靈能立量所改變，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離主腦5哩內的生物都會感覺到自己正在被跟蹤，儘管實際上並沒有這回事。
主腦可以監聽任何在距離它5哩內發生的心靈感應溝通。啟動該心靈感應溝通的生物必須在該心靈聯繫第一次被建立時進行一次DC 18的睿知（{@skill 察言觀色}）檢定。若檢定成功，則該生物將意識到某種存在正在監聽這段溝通。這個檢定不會接露監聽者的本質，且除非主腦已經與該生物建立精神連結，否則主腦無法參與到這個心靈感應溝通中。
任何已經與主腦建立精神連結的生物都會在其內心深處聽見模糊、無法理解的低語。這種精神殘渣是由主腦和其他與之建立聯繫生物的雜念所混合而成的。

regionalEffects: 若主腦死亡，這些效應都將立即消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Fraz-Urb'luu
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Fraz-Urb'luu can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Fraz-Urb'luu causes up to 5 doors within the lair to be come walls, and an equal number of doors to appear on walls where there previously were none.

Fraz-Urb'luu chooses one humanoid within the lair and instantly creates a simulacrum of that creature (as if created with the {@spell simulacrum} spell). This simulacrum obeys Fraz-Urb'luu's commands and is destroyed on the next initiative count 20.
Fraz-Urb'luu creates a wave of anguish. Each creature he can see within the lair must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 33 ({@dice 6d10}) psychic damage.

regionalEffects: The region containing Fraz-Urb'luu's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Intelligent creatures within 1 mile of the lair frequently see hallucinations of long-dead friends and comrades that vanish after only a brief glimpse.
Roads and paths within 6 miles of the lair twist and turn back on themselves, making navigation in the area exceedingly difficult.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Fraz-Urb'luu table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Fraz-Urb'luu dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Fraz-Urb'luu
entries: If a creature goes mad in Fraz-Urb'luu's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Fraz-Urb'luu table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Fraz-Urb'luu
rows: "I never let anyone know the truth about my actions or intentions, even if doing so would be beneficial to me."
"I have intermittent hallucinations and fits of catatonia."
"My mind wanders as I have elaborate fantasies that have no bearing on reality. When I return my focus to the world, I have a hard time remembering that it was just a daydream."
"I convince myself that things are true, even in the face of overwhelming evidence to the contrary."
"My perception of reality doesn't match anyone else's. It makes me prone to violent delusions that make no sense to anyone else."

legendaryGroup.name: Gar Shatterkeel
lairActions: 當加爾位於水之節點，而{@creature Olhydra|PotA|奧莉德拉}不在該處時，加爾將可以採取巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），加爾可以採取一次巢穴動作以使用他的多重攻擊、或施放他的其中一個法術，最高3環，且無須使用任何構材或法術位。他不能連續兩輪施放相同的法術，但他可以持續專注於他之前使用巢穴動作所施放的法術。當加爾專注於他以巢穴動作施放的法術時，他將無法採取巢穴動作。他最喜歡利用這個能力施放{@spell 造成傷勢}或{@spell 召雷術}。
若加爾使用這個巢穴動作以施放{@spell 治療傷勢}，他將回復該法術所能提供的最大生命值(28點)。

legendaryGroup.name: Gold Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），金龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；金龍不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 金龍瞥見一瞬的未來，因此它將在攻擊檢定、屬性檢定、和豁免檢定中具有優勢，直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。

一個距離金龍120呎內且它所能看見的生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的魅力豁免，否則將被放逐到一個夢境位面：一個誕生自金龍幻想的特殊存在位面。要從中逃離，該生物必須使用它的動作進行一次魅力檢定以對抗金龍的魅力檢定。若該生物勝出，則它將從夢境位面中逃離。除此之外，這個效果將在下一輪的先攻順序輪到20時結束。當這個效果結束時，該生物將重新出現在它離開時所在的空間，或若該空間已被佔據則出現在最近一處未被佔據空間。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇金龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 每當一個理解至少一種語言的生物在距離巢穴6哩內的區域進入冥想狀態或夢境時，金龍可以與該生物建立心靈感應，並在它的夢境中與之溝通。該生物在甦醒後仍將記得它與金龍的交談內容。
層層美麗的乳白色迷霧出現在距離巢穴6哩內的區域。這陣迷霧不會遮蔽任何事物。當邪惡生物接近在迷霧中的金龍或其他非邪惡生物時，迷霧將會環繞在他們身邊，警告他們危險的逼近。
距離巢穴1哩內的寶石和珍珠將閃爍發光，散發出5呎半徑的微光光照。

regionalEffects: 若金龍死亡，這些效應都將立即終止。

legendaryGroup.name: Graz'zt
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Graz'zt can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Graz'zt casts the {@spell command} spell on every creature of his choice in the lair. He needn't see each one, but he must be aware that an individual is in the lair to target that creature. He issues the same command to all the targets.

Smooth surfaces within the lair become as reflective as a polished mirror. Until a different lair action is used, creatures within the lair have disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

regionalEffects: The region containing Graz'zt's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Flat surfaces within 1 mile of the lair that are made of stone or metal become highly reflective, as though polished to a shine. These surfaces become supernaturally mirrorlike.
Wild beasts within 6 miles of the lair break into frequent conflicts and coupling, mirroring the behavior that occurs during their mating seasons.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Graz'zt table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Graz'zt dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Graz'zt
entries: If a creature goes mad in Graz'zt's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Graz'zt table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Graz'zt
rows: "There is nothing in the world more important than me and my desires."
"Anyone who doesn't do exactly what I say doesn't deserve to live."
"Mine is the path of redemption. Anyone who says otherwise is intentionally misleading you."
"I will not rest until I have made someone else mine, and doing so is more important to me than my own life—or the lives of others."
"My own pleasure is of paramount importance. Everything else, including social graces, is a triviality."
"Anything that can bring me happiness should be enjoyed immediately. There is no point to saving anything pleasurable for later."

legendaryGroup.name: Green Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），綠龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；綠龍不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 糾纏的根鬚和藤蔓將以距離綠龍120呎內且它所能看見地面上的一點為中心湧出並覆蓋20呎半徑的區域。這片區域變為困難地形，且每個在該處的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的力量豁免，否則將被根鬚和藤蔓給{@condition 束縛}。一個生物可以藉由採取一個動作進行一次DC 15的力量檢定並成功，以將它自己或另一個生物給釋放。這些根鬚和藤蔓將在綠龍再次使用這個巢穴動作、或當綠龍死亡時枯萎消失。

一道纏繞著帶刺荊棘的灌木叢牆在距離綠龍120呎內的一處固態表面上生長湧現而出。這道牆最多60呎長，10呎高，5呎厚，且能夠遮蔽視線。當這道牆出現時，每個位於牆壁範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免。一個豁免失敗的生物將受到18 ({@dice 4d8})穿刺傷害，且被往牆壁的空間外推離5呎距離，出現在牆壁的任意一側（由它決定）。一個生物可以移動穿過這道牆，儘管這個過程會緩慢而痛苦。一個生物每穿過這道牆1呎，它都必須消耗4呎的移動速度。除此之外，當一個生物在它接觸這道牆壁的每個回合中都必須進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，若豁免失敗將受到18 ({@dice 4d8})穿刺傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。這道牆壁中每10呎的區塊都具有AC 5以及15點生命值，對火焰易傷，對鈍擊和穿刺傷害具有抗性，且免疫於精神傷害。這道牆會在綠龍再次使用這個巢穴動作、或當綠龍死亡時沉入地面。
魔法迷霧將環繞翻騰於一個距離綠龍120呎內且它所能看見的生物周遭。該生物必須成功通過一次DC 15的睿知豁免，否則被綠龍給{@condition 魅惑}，持續直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇綠龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離巢穴1哩內區域中的灌木叢將形成迷宮般的通道。這些灌木叢被視為10呎高，10呎厚，且能遮蔽視線的牆壁。生物可以移動穿過這些灌木叢，且生物每移動1呎，它都必須消耗4呎的移動速度。一個在灌木叢內的生物必須在它與灌木叢接觸時的每個回合進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，若豁免失敗將受到來自棘刺的3 ({@dice 1d6})穿刺傷害。
每10呎邊長立方體的灌木叢具有AC 5以及30點生命值，對鈍擊和穿刺傷害具有抗性，對火焰易傷，且免疫於精神和雷鳴傷害。
在距離它巢穴1哩內的區域，除非它刻意如此，否則綠龍可以選擇不留下任何它通過的物理痕跡。除非透過魔法手段，否則在該處追蹤它將是不可能的。此外，它將無視任何來自這片區域內非魔法或生物的植物所造成的阻礙移動效果或傷害，包括上述的灌木叢。這些植物將在綠龍通過時自行避讓。
距離巢穴1哩內區域中的囓齒動物和鳥類都將作為綠龍的耳目。詭異地，鹿和其他大型獵物並不存在，暗示著這名飢餓超自然獵食者的存在。

regionalEffects: 若綠龍死亡，囓齒動物和鳥類都將失去牠們與綠龍的超自然連結。灌木叢將維持存在，但在{@dice 1d10}天內，它們將失去它們的棘刺，變回尋常植物以及普通的困難地形。

legendaryGroup.name: Imix
lairActions: Imix is master of heat and flames in his vicinity. He can take lair actions on the Elemental Plane of Fire, or in any elemental fire node (such as the Weeping Colossus in chapter 5). On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Imix uses his lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Any fires in the lair flare up drastically, quadrupling in size (for example, a fire blazing in a 5-foot by 5-foot area expands to a 10-foot by 10-foot area). Pools or streams of lava or other molten material are also affected. Creatures caught in the area of an expanded fire are subject to the normal damage for entering or being in the fire. Creatures caught by a sudden flood of lava must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone, in addition to the normal damage for contact with molten rock.

A thick cloud of black smoke and burning embers fills a 40-foot-radius sphere within 120 feet of Imix, lasting until initiative count 20 of the next round. Creatures and objects within or beyond the smoke are heavily obscured. A creature that enters the cloud of embers for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) fire damage.

A wave of searing heat fills the lair in a 300-foot radius around Imix for an instant. Each creature other than Imix in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take {@dice 1d8} fire damage. Creatures that take fire damage from this effect gain one level of exhaustion. In addition, there is a fifty percent chance that any container of fluid held or carried by an affected creature (for example, a magic potion) is destroyed.

regionalEffects: The region containing an elemental node in which Imix is present becomes vulnerable to the influence of fire. This creates the following effects:

items: A dry, baking heat wave strikes the region within 10 miles of Imix's location. At first, effects are minor - grass turns brown, animals become listless, work and travel become very tiring. The longer Imix remains, the worse the heat becomes; after 5 days, crops die and ponds dry up; after 10 days, unprotected livestock dies, and wells and small rivers dry up; after 20 days, large lakes and rivers are reduced in depth by 20 feet and shrink accordingly.

Wildfires erupt within a 5-mile radius of Imix's lair. Every hour, there is a ten percent chance that characters in this area are caught in the path of a wildfire moving 50 feet per round. Each character must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@dice 3d6}) fire damage. A wildfire continues to threaten the characters for {@dice 1d10} rounds or until they get out of its path. Wooden structures caught in the wildfire are destroyed.

Lava fountains erupt from the ground within 1 mile of Imix's lair. Every hour, there is a ten percent chance that characters in this area are close enough to an erupting lava fountain to be in danger. A lava fountain creates a vent 20 feet in diameter, and hurls globs of lava up to 200 feet away. Each character within this area must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@dice 2d10}) bludgeoning damage plus 17 ({@dice 5d6}) fire damage. A fountain lasts for {@dice 2d10} rounds before subsiding.
Wildfires or volcanic fissures within 1 mile of Imix's lair form intermittent portals to the Elemental Plane of Fire, allowing elemental creatures into the mortal world to dwell near those points.

regionalEffects: If Imix is destroyed or banished back to his home plane, the regional effects fade over the next {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Juiblex
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Juiblex can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Juiblex slimes a square area of ground it can see within the lair. The area can be up to 10 feet on a side. The slime lasts for 1 hour or until it is burned away with fire. When the slime appears, each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or become restrained. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, that creature must make the same save. A restrained creature is stuck as long as it remains in the slimy area or until it breaks free. The restrained creature, or another creature who can reach it, can use its action to try to break free and must succeed on a DC 21 Strength check. If the slime is set on fire, it burns away after 1 round. Any creature that starts its turn in the burning slime takes 22 ({@dice 4d10}) fire damage.

Juiblex slimes a square area of ground it can see within the lair. The area can be up to 10 feet on a side. The slime lasts for 1 hour or until it is burned away with fire. When the slime appears, each creature on it must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone and slide 10 feet in a random direction determined by a {@dice d8} roll. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, that creature must make the same save. If the slime is set on fire, it burns away after 1 round. Any creature that starts its turn in the burning slime takes 22 ({@dice 4d10}) fire damage.
A green slime (see the Dungeon Master's Guide) appears on a spot on the ceiling that Juiblex chooses within the lair. The slime disintegrates after 1 hour.

regionalEffects: The region containing Juiblex's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Small bodies of water, such as ponds or wells, within 1 mile of the lair turn highly acidic, corroding any object that touches them. Surfaces within 6 miles of the lair are frequently covered by a thin film of slime, which is slick and sticks to anything that touches it.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Juiblex table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Juiblex dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Juiblex
entries: If a creature goes mad in Juiblex's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Juiblex table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Juiblex
rows: "I refuse to part with any of my possessions."
"I'll do everything I can to get others to eat and drink beyond their normal limits."
"I must possess as many material goods as I can."
"My personality is irrelevant. I am defined by what I consume."

legendaryGroup.name: Ki-rin
lairActions: 在它的巢穴內，麒麟具有每天最多三次召喚出物體的能力，使用下列能力各一次。第一個能力為永久創造出足以充斥20呎邊長立方體其中一面，由柔軟、植物原料製成的物體──包括像是布匹、枕頭、繩索、毛毯、和衣服這類的加工物。第二個能力是永久創造出足以充斥10呎邊長立方體其中一面，由木材或其他類似硬質植物製成的物體。第三個能力是創造出足以充斥2呎邊長立方體其中一面，由石頭或金屬製成的物體，但透過這個方式創造的物體只能存在1小時。
regionalEffects: 麒麟的天界本質轉變了它巢穴周遭的區域。在鄰近的旅行者有可能會遭遇到下列任何的魔法效應：

items: 距離麒麟巢穴3哩內的流水都是潔淨的。任何故意導致的水體腐壞都不會持續超過3分鐘。
距離麒麟巢穴3哩內的動物、植物、和善良生物都將向著理想型態的進化過程中而獲得生機。這類生物很少對其他並非獵物的生物展現出攻擊性。邪惡生物將無法忍受這片區域內的神聖氛圍，且通常會選擇在遠離麒麟巢穴的地方居住。
距離麒麟巢穴3哩內，影響著善良陣營生物的詛咒、疾病、和毒素都將被壓制。
當位於其巢穴3哩內時，麒麟可以施放{@spell 操控天氣}。這個法術的源點永遠位於戶外最接近其巢穴中央的位置。麒麟並不需要維持與天空該點之間的暢通路徑，也不需要維持專注，就能持續這個天氣改變的效果。
離麒麟巢穴3哩內，風將吹拂托起因為麒麟或其盟友的無作為而摔落的非邪惡生物。這類生物將以每輪60呎的速度下降，且不會受到任何墜落傷害。

regionalEffects: 若麒麟死亡，這些效應都將立即終止，然而其激發動植物生機的效果將持續長達3年。

legendaryGroup.name: Kraken
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），克拉肯可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 一陣強勁的水流穿過克拉肯的巢穴。每個距離克拉肯60呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 23的力量豁免，否則將被推離克拉肯最多60呎距離。若豁免成功，則該生物將被推離克拉肯10呎距離。
距離克拉肯60呎內，且在水中的生物將獲得對閃電傷害的易傷，持續直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。
克拉肯巢穴中的水域將充滿電流。所有距離克拉肯120呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 23的體質豁免，豁免失敗則受到10 ({@dice 3d6})閃電傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著克拉肯巢穴的區域被該生物的瀆神本質所扭曲，並創造出以下魔法效應：

items: 克拉肯可以隨意改變以它巢穴為中心的6哩半徑內區域的天氣。此效應與{@spell 操控天氣}法術相同。
距離巢穴6哩內的區域凝聚出許多{@creature 水元素}。這些元素無法離開水域，且智力和魅力值為1(-5)。
距離巢穴6哩內，智力值為2或更低的水生生物將被克拉肯{@condition 魅惑}，並會對該區域的入侵者展開攻擊。

regionalEffects: 若克拉肯死亡，這些效應都將立即消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Lich
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），巫妖可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；巫妖不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 巫妖骰一顆{@dice d8}並恢復一個環階等同於該骰值或更低的法術位。若它沒有已消耗的法術位，則什麼事都不會發生。
巫妖選擇一個距離它30呎內且它所能看見的生物做為目標。一道帶著劈啪聲的負能量繫繩將連結著巫妖和目標。每當巫妖受到傷害，目標將必須進行一次DC 18的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，巫妖將只受到一半的傷害（向下取整），且目標將受到另一半的傷害。這道繫繩將持續直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20，或直到目標或巫妖都不再位於巫妖的巢穴。
巫妖呼喚在它巢穴內死去的生物的精魂。這些亡魂將顯現並攻擊一個距離巫妖60呎內且它所能看見的生物。目標必須成功通過一次DC 18的體質豁免，豁免失敗將受到52 ({@dice 15d6})死靈傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。這些亡魂接著將消失無蹤。

legendaryGroup.name: Illithilich
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），奪心魔巫妖可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；奪心魔巫妖不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 奪心魔巫妖骰一顆{@dice d8}並恢復一個環階等同於該骰值或更低的法術位。若它沒有已消耗的法術位，則什麼事都不會發生。
奪心魔巫妖選擇一個距離它30呎內且它所能看見的生物做為目標。一道帶著劈啪聲的負能量繫繩將連結著奪心魔巫妖和目標。每當奪心魔巫妖受到傷害，目標將必須進行一次DC 18的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，奪心魔巫妖將只受到一半的傷害（向下取整），且目標將受到另一半的傷害。這道繫繩將持續直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20，或直到目標或奪心魔巫妖都不再位於奪心魔巫妖的巢穴。
奪心魔巫妖呼喚在它巢穴內死去的生物的精魂。這些亡魂將顯現並攻擊一個距離奪心魔巫妖60呎內且它所能看見的生物。目標必須成功通過一次DC 18的體質豁免，豁免失敗將受到52 ({@dice 15d6})死靈傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。這些亡魂接著將消失無蹤。

legendaryGroup.name: Marlos Urnrayle
lairActions: 當馬洛斯位於土之節點，而{@creature Ogrémoch|PotA|歐格莫克}不在該處時，馬洛斯將可以採取巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），馬洛斯可以採取一次巢穴動作以施放{@spell 地震術}法術，而無須使用任何構材。只要他仍專注於{@spell 地震術}法術，先攻順序20對於該法術而言就被視為馬洛斯的回合開始。當馬洛斯專注於{@spell 地震術}法術時，他將無法採取巢穴動作。
馬洛斯的第二個巢穴動作選項是汲取土之節點的能量以治療自己。當他這麼做時，他將回復30 ({@dice 6d8+3})點生命值。

legendaryGroup.name: Mummy Lord
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），木乃伊領主可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；木乃伊領主不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20，每個巢穴內的不死生物都可以準確定位每個距離其120呎內的活體生物所在的確切位置。
直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20，每個巢穴內的不死生物在對抗驅散不死的效果時所進行的豁免檢定中具有優勢。
直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20，任何在木乃伊領主的巢穴內嘗試施放4環或以下法術的非不死生物都將被痛苦侵襲。該生物可以選擇進行其他動作，但若它仍嘗試施放法術，則它必須進行一次DC 16的體質豁免。若豁免失敗，則它將受到該法術每環階{@dice 1d6}的死靈傷害，且該法術不會發揮任何效果並被浪費。

regionalEffects: 一座木乃伊領主的神廟或陵墓將被該生物的黑暗本質以下列任何方式給扭曲：

items: 被帶進巢穴的食物將立即腐敗，且飲用水也將立即蒸發。其他非魔法的飲料也將變質－舉例來說，葡萄酒將被變成醋。
在巢穴中由木乃伊領主以外生物所施放的預言系法術，將有25％的機率呈現誤導性的結果，由DM決定。若該預言系法術已經存在失敗的機率或會在多次施放時變得不可靠，則該機率將會增加25％。
一個從巢穴內取走財寶的生物將被詛咒，直到該財寶被歸還。被詛咒的目標將在所有豁免檢定中承受劣勢。這個詛咒會持續直到被{@spell 移除詛咒}法術或其他魔法效果解除。

regionalEffects: 若木乃伊領主被摧毀，這些效應都將立即消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Ogrémoch
lairActions: Ogrémoch can assert his dominion over the rock and stone around him to take lair actions on the Elemental Plane of Earth, or in any elemental earth node (including the Black Geode, described in chapter 5). On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Ogrémoch uses his lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: A 10-foot-radius area of rocky or earthy ground within 60 feet of Ogrémoch turns to sticky mud. Any creature on the ground in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or sink 5 feet into the mud and be restrained. A creature can take an action to make a DC 15 Strength check, ending the effect on itself or another creature within its reach on a success.

Crystalline spikes grow from the ground in a 20-foot-radius area within 60 feet of Ogrémoch. The area becomes difficult terrain. A creature that moves through the affected area takes {@dice 1d8} piercing damage for every 5 feet it moves there. Creatures that are knocked prone in the area also take this damage.

A violent tremor shakes the lair in a 120-foot-radius around Ogrémoch. Each creature other than Ogrémoch on the ground in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone.

regionalEffects: The region containing an elemental node in which Ogrémoch is present is seriously affected, becoming geologically unstable. This creates the following effects:

items: Earth tremors strike the region within 10 miles of Ogrémoch's location every {@dice 2d12} hours, each lasting {@dice 1d10} rounds. At first, damage is minor—broken windows, cracked plaster, items toppled off shelves. The longer Ogrémoch remains, the stronger the tremors become. After 5 days, the tremors are strong enough to destroy flimsy structures. After 10 days, they are strong enough to destroy ordinary wooden buildings. After 20 days, they can seriously damage or destroy reinforced or fortified structures.
Magnetic disturbances within 10 miles of Ogrémoch prevent compasses from functioning there.

Hidden sinkholes and fissures form within 1 mile of Ogrémoch's location. A hidden sinkhole can be spotted from a safe distance by any creature with a passive Wisdom (Perception) score of 15 or higher or spotted with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Survival) check. Otherwise, the first creature to step on the thin crust covering the sinkhole must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or fall {@dice 1d6 × 10} feet into the sinkhole or fissure.
Natural caves and tunnels within 1 mile of Ogrémoch's lair form intermittent portals to the Elemental Plane of Earth, allowing elemental creatures into the mortal world to dwell near those points.

regionalEffects: If Ogrémoch is destroyed or banished back to his home plane, the regional effects fade over the next {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Olhydra
lairActions: Olhydra can command the waters around herself to take lair actions on the Elemental Plane of Water, or in any elemental water node (such as the Plunging Torrents, described in chapter 5). On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Olhydra uses her lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Pools of water in the lair surge outward in a grasping tide. Any creature within 20 feet of such a pool must succeed on a DC 20 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet into the water and knocked prone.
Water within 120 feet of Olhydra becomes murky and opaque until initiative count 20 of the next round. A creature with darkvision can't see through the water, and light can't illuminate it.

A freezing fog fills a 40-foot-radius sphere within 120 feet of Olhydra, lasting until initiative count 20 of the next round. Creatures and objects within or beyond the fog are heavily obscured. A creature that enters the freezing cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) cold damage.

regionalEffects: Olhydra's presence in an elemental node creates a number of widespread effects—bad weather, strong tides, and increasing aggression from dangerous sea life.

items: Violent downpours become frequent within 10 miles of the lair. A downpour occurs once every {@dice 2d12} hours, and lasts {@dice 1d3} hours. Downpours are so heavy that creatures moving overland travel at half normal speed
Within 5 miles of the lair, currents and tides are exceptionally strong and treacherous. Any ability checks made to safely navigate or control a vessel moving through these waters has disadvantage.

Aquatic creatures that have an Intelligence score of 2 or lower within 1 mile of the lair must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw when they enter the area. If the saving throw succeeds, the creature is frightened and attempts to leave the area, remaining frightened while within it. On a failure, the creature becomes highly aggressive and remains in the area for 24 hours. While in this state, the creature gains advantage on saving throws against charm and fear effects.
Natural springs and pools within 1 mile of the lair form intermittent portals to the Elemental Plane of Water, allowing elemental creatures into the mortal world to dwell near those points.

regionalEffects: If Olhydra is destroyed or banished back to her home plane, the regional effects fade over the next {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Orcus
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Orcus can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Orcus's voice booms throughout the lair. His utterance causes one creature of his choice to be subjected to {@spell power word kill}. Orcus needn't see the creature, but he must be aware that the individual is in the lair.
Orcus causes up to six corpses within the lair to rise as skeletons, zombies, or ghouls. These undead obey his telepathic commands, which can reach anywhere in the lair.

Orcus causes skeletal arms to rise from an area on the ground in a 20-foot square that he can see. They last until the next initiative count 20. Each creature in that area when the arms appear must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the arms disappear or until Orcus releases their grasp (no action required).

regionalEffects: The region containing Orcus's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Dead beasts periodically animate as undead mockeries of their former selves. Skeletal and zombie versions of local wildlife are commonly seen in the area.
The air becomes filled with the stench of rotting flesh, and buzzing flies grow thick within the region, even when there is no carrion to be found.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Orcus table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Orcus dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Orcus
entries: If a creature goes mad in Orcus's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Orcus table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Orcus
rows: "I often become withdrawn and moody, dwelling on the insufferable state of life."
"I am compelled to make the weak suffer."
"I have no compunction against tampering with the dead in my search to better understand death."
"I want to achieve the everlasting existence of undeath."
"I am awash in the awareness of life's futility."

legendaryGroup.name: Red Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），紅龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；紅龍不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 熔岩從距離紅龍120呎內且它所能看見的一點噴發，創造出一道20呎高、5呎半徑的湧泉。每個在湧泉範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，若豁免失敗將受到21 ({@dice 6d6})火焰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。
一陣劇烈震動搖晃著的紅龍周遭60呎半徑的巢穴。每個在區域內地面上除了紅龍以外的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的敏捷豁免，否則被擊倒{@condition 伏地}。

火山氣體形成的雲團將以距離紅龍120呎內且它所能看見的一點為中心形成一個20呎半徑的球體區域。這個雲團會繞過轉角，且它所在的區域將被輕度遮蔽。雲團將持續存在直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。每個在這個雲團內開始它回合的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態直到它回合結束。當因為這個方式而陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態，該生物將同時陷入{@condition 無力}狀態。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇紅龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離巢穴6哩內的區域經常會發生小型地震。
距離巢穴1哩內的水源將因超自然力量而變暖，且被硫磺汙染。
距離巢穴1哩內的岩石裂縫將形成通往火元素位面的傳送門，讓火元素生物得以進到這個世界並在附近棲息。

regionalEffects: 若紅龍死亡，這些效應都將在{@dice 1d10}天內逐漸消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Silver Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），銀龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 銀龍如同施放{@spell 雲霧術}法術一樣創造出一陣濃霧。這陣濃霧會持續存在直到下一輪的先攻順序輪到20。
一陣猛烈的寒風在銀龍的附近呼嘯穿過整個巢穴。每個距離銀龍120呎內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則受到5 ({@dice 1d10})寒冰傷害。氣體和蒸氣都將被這股風吹散，且不受保護的火焰也將被熄滅。受保護的火焰；例如提燈，將有50%的機率被熄滅。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇銀龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 每天一次，銀龍可以改變以它巢穴為中心的6哩半徑內區域的天氣。銀龍並不需要在戶外；除此之外，此效應的效果與{@spell 操控天氣}法術相同。
在距離巢穴1哩內的區域，風將吹拂托起因為銀龍或其盟友的無作為而摔落的非邪惡生物。這類生物將以每輪60呎的速度下降，且不會受到任何墜落傷害。
透過數日或更長的時間，銀龍可以使它巢穴內的雲層和濃霧變得如石頭一般結實，形成建築物和其他銀龍所希望的物體。

regionalEffects: 若銀龍死亡，被改變的天氣將如法術詳述中所記載的方式回復正常，且其他效應將在{@dice 1d10}天內逐漸消散。

legendaryGroup.name: Sphinx
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），斯芬克斯可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；直到完成一次短休或長休之前，斯芬克斯不能再使用相同的效果：

items: 時間的流動被扭曲，因此每個在巢穴內的生物都必須重骰先攻。斯芬克斯可以選擇不重骰。
時間的效應被扭曲，因此每個在巢穴內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 15的體質豁免，否則將變得衰老或年輕{@dice 1d20}歲（由斯芬克斯決定），但永遠不會變得低於1歲。{@spell 高等復原術}可以將該生物的年紀恢復正常。
巢穴內的時間的流動被扭曲，因此所有事物都將向過去或未來移動10年（由斯芬克斯決定）。只有斯芬克斯能夠立即意識到時間的變化。{@spell 祈願術}法術可以將施法者和最多七個由施法者指定的其他生物回到它們原本的時間。
斯芬克斯將自己和最多七個在它巢穴內且它所能看見的其他生物轉移到另一個存在位面。一旦離開它的巢穴，斯芬克斯將無法使用它的巢穴動作，但可以在它的回合以一個附贈動作帶著最多七個生物回到它自己的巢穴。

legendaryGroup.name: Storm Giant Quintessent
lairActions: 風暴巨人昇華者可以在它處於巨人型態、以及轉化為暴風期間使用巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），巨人可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；巨人不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 巨人以其巢穴內任意一點為中心創造出一陣迸發雷鳴。每個距離該點20尺內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 18的體質豁免，否則將陷入{@condition 耳聾}直到它的下個回合結束。
巨人以其巢穴內任意一點為中心創造出一團20呎半徑的球體濃霧（或在水中則為一團濁水）。這陣濃霧會繞過轉角，且濃霧區域被重度遮蔽。這陣濃霧會持續存在直到巨人將其解消（無須動作），且它不會被風給吹散。
巨人以其巢穴內任意一點為源頭創造出一陣60呎長、10呎寬的直線強風（或在水中則為一陣激流）。每個在直線範圍內的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 18的力量豁免，否則將沿著風向被推動最多15呎距離。這陣強風會吹散氣體和水氣，且它會熄滅蠟燭、火炬、和區域內其他類似的未受保護的火焰。它會使受保護的火焰（例如提燈）有50%的機率熄滅。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著風暴巨人昇華者巢穴的區域被該巨人的本質所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 距離它巢穴1哩內的區域將颳起劇烈強風，除非是在防風處點燃，否則火焰在這個區域內將因為強風而不可能被點燃。
距離它巢穴1哩內的區域將持續著降雨、降雪、或者颳動著揚塵或揚沙（選擇最適合其環境的效果）。持續的降雨將使河流溪水暴漲或溢出河岸；降雪、揚塵、或揚沙則會形成厚重的積雪或沙丘。
距離它巢穴5哩內的區域將日夜不斷地發生耀眼閃電和隆隆雷鳴。

regionalEffects: 若巨人死亡，閃電、雷鳴、和強風的區域效應都將立即消失。降雨、降雪、以及揚塵都將在{@dice 1d8}天內逐漸減弱。

legendaryGroup.name: Strahd von Zarovich
lairActions: While Strahd is in Castle Ravenloft, he can take lair actions as long as he isn't incapacitated.
On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Strahd can take one of the following lair action options, or forgo using any of them in that round:

items: Until initiative count 20 of the next round, Strahd can pass through solid walls, doors, ceilings, and floors as if they weren't there.

Strahd targets any number of doors and windows that he can see, causing each one to either open or close as he wishes. Closed doors can be magically locked (needing a successful DC 20 Strength check to force open) until Strahd chooses to end the effect, or until Strahd uses this lair action again.

Strahd summons the angry spirit of one who has died in the castle. The apparition appears next to a hostile creature that Strahd can see, makes an attack against that creature, and then disappears. The apparition has the statistics of a {@creature specter}.

Strahd targets one Medium or smaller creature that casts a shadow. The target's shadow must be visible to Strahd and within 30 feet of him. If the target fails a DC 17 Charisma saving throw, its shadow detaches from it and becomes a {@creature shadow} that obeys Strahd's commands, acting on initiative count 20. A {@spell greater restoration} spell or a {@spell remove curse} spell cast on the target restores its natural shadow, but only if its undead shadow has been destroyed.

legendaryGroup.name: Unicorn
regionalEffects: 受到該生物的天界本質而轉變，獨角獸所在的領地可能會包含以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 非魔法性質的未受保護火焰在獨角獸的領地內將會熄滅。火炬和營火將拒絕燃燒，但密封的提燈將不受影響。
原生於獨角獸領地的生物將更容易躲藏；牠們在所有為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。
當一個善良陣營的生物施放一個法術、或使用一個魔法效果以回復另一個善良陣營生物的生命值，目標將會回復該法術或效果最大可能數值的生命值。
影響任何善良陣營生物的詛咒將被抑制。

regionalEffects: 若獨角獸死亡，這些效應都將立即終止。

legendaryGroup.name: Vanifer
lairActions: 當凡妮弗位於火之節點，而{@creature Imix|PotA|伊密克斯}不在該處時，凡妮弗將可以採取巢穴動作。在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），凡妮弗可以採取一次巢穴動作以她的其中一個法術，最高3環，且無須使用任何構材或法術位。她不能連續兩輪施放相同的法術，但她可以持續專注於她之前使用巢穴動作所施放的法術。當凡妮弗專注於她以巢穴動作施放的法術時，她將無法採取巢穴動作。她最喜歡利用這個能力施放{@spell 火球術}或{@spell 催眠圖紋}。
若凡妮弗使用這個巢穴動作以施放{@spell 迷蹤步}，她將同時汲取火之節點中的能量。這麼做能夠讓她回復 15 ({@dice 3d8+2})點生命值。

legendaryGroup.name: Vampire
regionalEffects: 這片環繞著吸血鬼巢穴的區域因該生物的非自然本質而扭曲，創造出以下任意效應：

items: 區域內蝙蝠、老鼠、和狼的數量將明顯增加。
距離巢穴500呎內的植物凋零枯萎，且它們的枝幹將扭曲並長滿棘刺。
距離巢穴500呎內投射出的陰影看起來將異常憔悴，且有時會像是活著一樣自行移動。
距離巢穴500呎內的地面上匍匐著濃霧。這些濃霧有時會呈現出怪異的型態，像是屈伸抓握的怪爪或是蜷曲的蛇。

regionalEffects: 若吸血鬼死亡，這些效應都將在{@dice 2d6}天後終止。

legendaryGroup.name: White Dragon
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），白龍可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果；白龍不能連續兩輪使用相同的效果：

items: 寒冷濃霧將填滿以距離白龍120呎內且它所能看見的一點為中心的20呎半徑球型區域。這陣濃霧會繞過轉角，且它所在的區域將被重度遮蔽。每個在濃霧出現時處於範圍內的生物都必須進行一次DC 10的體質豁免，若豁免失敗將受到10 ({@dice 3d6})寒冰傷害，豁免成功則只受到一半的傷害。在這陣濃霧中結束它回合的生物將受到10 ({@dice 3d6})寒冰傷害。一道風速至少每小時20哩的風可以驅散這陣濃霧。除此之外這陣濃霧將會持續存在直到白龍再次使用這個巢穴動作、或直到白龍死亡。
尖錐碎冰將從天花板上墜落，襲向其下方距離白龍120呎內且它所能看見的最多三個生物。白龍對每個目標各自進行一次遠程攻擊檢定(命中{@hit 7})。若命中，目標將受到10 ({@dice 3d6})穿刺傷害。
白龍在距離它120呎內且它所能看見的一處固體表面上創造出一道透明的冰牆。這道冰牆可以最多30呎長，30呎高，且1呎厚。當這道牆出現時，每個在它範圍內的生物都將被往牆壁空間外推離5呎距離；出現在牆壁的任意一側（由它決定）。這道牆壁中每10呎邊長的區塊都具有AC 5以及30點生命值，對火焰易傷，且免疫於酸蝕、寒冰、死靈、毒素、和精神傷害。這道冰牆會在白龍再次使用這個巢穴動作、或當白龍死亡時消失。

regionalEffects: 這片坐落著傳奇白龍巢穴的區域被龍的魔法所扭曲，並創造出以下其中一個或多個效應：

items: 刺骨濃霧輕度遮蔽著距離巢穴6哩內的區域。
距離巢穴6哩內的區域下著寒冷的雪雨，有時甚至會在白龍休息時形成暴風雪。
冰牆隔開了白龍巢穴內的空間。每道牆壁都有6吋厚，且每10呎邊長的區塊都具有AC 5以及15點生命值，對火焰易傷，且免疫於酸蝕、寒冰、死靈、毒素、和精神傷害。
若白龍希望移動穿過這些冰牆，它將可以這麼做而不會被阻礙。然而，白龍移動穿過冰牆的部分將會因此被摧毀。

regionalEffects: 若白龍死亡，濃霧和雪雨都將在1天內消散。冰牆將會在{@dice 1d10}天內逐漸消融。

legendaryGroup.name: Yan-C-Bin
lairActions: Yan-C-Bin dwells in a palace of air on the Elemental Plane of Air. In his palace and in air nodes on the Material Plane (including the Howling Caves, described in chapter 5), Yan-C-Bin is master. He can use the following actions in his lair. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Yan-C-Bin takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects; he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Yan-C-Bin drops the temperature of the air, covering all surfaces with ice. This effect is identical to the {@spell sleet storm} spell.

Yan-C-Bin controls the surrounding air as an extension of himself. Each creature Yan-C-Bin designates must succeed at a DC 24 Constitution saving throw or be hoisted or flung {@dice 3d6 × 10} feet through the air. A creature smashed into a solid object or released in mid-air takes {@dice 1d6} bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet moved or fallen.

Yan-C-Bin creates a torrent of debris within 120 feet of him that lasts until initiative count 20 on the next round. The debris lightly obscures every creature and object in the area for the duration. All creatures in the area must succeed at a DC 24 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded until initiative count 20 on the next round.

regionalEffects: When Yan-C-Bin inhabits an elemental node, the air is at his command. Temperatures fluctuate from blistering hot to freezing cold; thunder rolls and lightning cracks; powerful gales bear heavy creatures and objects aloft and hurl them with incredible force; cyclones touch down randomly, obliterating whatever they touch.

items: Gale force winds tear across the landscape in a 5-mile radius, whisking away small or light objects, dismantling roofs and fences, tearing branches from trees, and making flight impossible. Small and Medium creatures move at half speed through the wind; Tiny creatures exposed to the wind are carried away with it at a rate of 40 feet per round unless they succeed at a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check.

Thunderstorms erupt in a 5-mile radius centered on Yan-C-Bin's lair, creating deafening cracks of thunder and constant lightning. Every ten minutes the storm rages, creatures standing beneath the open sky have a five percent chance of being struck by lightning. A creature struck by lightning must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@dice 6d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Cyclones touch down within a 5-mile radius of Yan-C-Bin's lair. Every hour, there is a five percent chance that characters in this area are caught in the path of a cyclone moving 250 feet per round. Each character must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 33 ({@dice 6d10}) bludgeoning damage. Wooden or flimsy structures in the path of the cyclone are destroyed.

Natural caverns and windblown canyons within 1 mile of the lair form intermittent portals to the Elemental Plane of Air, allowing elemental creatures into the mortal world to dwell near those locations.

regionalEffects: If Yan-C-Bin is destroyed or banished back to his home plane, the regional effects fade over the next {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Yeenoghu
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Yeenoghu can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Yeenoghu causes an iron spike - 5 feet tall and 1 inch in diameter - to burst from the ground at a point he can see within 100 feet of him. Any creature in the space where the spike emerges must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 ({@dice 6d8}) piercing damage and is restrained by being impaled on the spike. A creature can use an action to remove itself (or a creature it can reach) from the spike, ending the restrained condition.
Each gnoll or hyena that Yeenoghu can see can use its reaction to move up to its speed.

Until the next initiative count 20, all gnolls and hyenas within the lair are enraged, causing them to have advantage on melee weapon attack rolls and causing attack rolls to have advantage against them.

regionalEffects: The region containing Yeenoghu's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Within 1 mile of the lair, large iron spikes grow out of the ground and stone surfaces. Yeenoghu impales the bodies of the slain on these spikes.
Predatory beasts within 6 miles of the lair become unusually savage, killing far more than what they need for food. Carcasses of prey are left to rot in an unnatural display of wasteful slaughter.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Yeenoghu table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Yeenoghu dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Yeenoghu
entries: If a creature goes mad in Yeenoghu's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Yeenoghu table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Yeenoghu
rows: "I get caught up in the flow of anger, and try to stoke others around me into forming an angry mob."
"The flesh of other intelligent creatures is delicious!"
"I rail against the laws and customs of civilization, attempting to return to a more primitive time."
"I hunger for the deaths of others, and am constantly starting fights in the hope of seeing bloodshed."
"I keep trophies from the bodies I have slain, turning them into adornments."

legendaryGroup.name: Zuggtmoy
lairActions: On Initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Zuggtmoy can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects: he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Zuggtmoy causes four {@creature gas spore|mm|gas spores} or {@creature violet fungus|mm|violet fungi} to appear in unoccupied spaces that she chooses within the lair. They vanish after 1 hour.
Up to four plant creatures that are friendly to Zuggtmoy and that Zuggtmoy can see can use their reactions to move up to their speed and make one weapon attack.
Zuggtmoy uses either her Infestation Spores or her Mind Control Spores, centered on a mushroom or other fungus within her lair, instead of on herself.

regionalEffects: The region containing Zuggtmoy's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Molds and fungi grow on surfaces within 6 miles of the lair, even where they would normally find no purchase.
Plant life within 1 mile of the lair becomes infested with parasitic fungi, slowly mutating as it is overwhelmed.

If a humanoid spends at least 1 hour within 1 mile of the lair, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or descend into a madness determined by the Madness of Zuggtmoy table. A creature that succeeds on this saving throw can't be affected by this regional effect again for 24 hours.

regionalEffects: If Zuggtmoy dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

regionalEffects.name: Madness of Zuggtmoy
entries: If a creature goes mad in Zuggtmoy's lair or within line of sight of the demon lord, roll on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table to determine the nature of the madness, which is a character flaw that lasts until cured. See the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|dmg|8|madness} for more on madness.

entries.caption: Madness of Zuggtmoy
rows: "I see visions in the world around me that others do not."
"I periodically slip into a catatonic state, staring off into the distance for long stretches at a time."
"I see an altered version of reality, with my mind convincing itself that things are true even in the face of overwhelming evidence to the contrary."
"My mind is slipping away, and my intelligence seems to wax and wane."
"I am constantly scratching at unseen fungal infections."

legendaryGroup.name: Morkoth
lairActions: 在先攻順序輪到20時（先攻相等時則為後手），莫客魚怪可以採取一次巢穴動作以造成以下其中一個效果：

items: 莫客魚怪使用它的催眠動作，並以距離它120呎內的一點為源點。它並不需要看見這個效果的源點。
莫客魚怪施放{@spell 黑暗術}、{@spell 解除魔法}、或{@spell 迷蹤步}，使用智力做為它的施法屬性，且無須消耗法術位。

regionalEffects: 莫客魚怪巢穴周遭的島嶼被該生物的存在本質所扭曲，並創造出以下效應：

items: 莫客魚怪能察覺到任何來到它島嶼或私室的物體或生物。以一個動作，莫客魚怪能夠定位任何位在其島嶼上的一個生物或物體的位置。這座島嶼的造訪者將會感覺到自己正在被注視，儘管實際上並沒有這回事。

每當一個在這座島嶼上待不足一年的生物完成一次短休或長休，它都必須進行一次DC 10的智力（{@skill 調查}）檢定。若檢定失敗，該生物將會隨意擱置並遺失一個所有物（若該生物為玩家角色，則由玩家決定遺失的物品）。這個所有物將在短時間內被隱蔽起來，但仍然遺留在附近，因此它可以透過成功通過一次DC 15的睿知（{@skill 觀察}）檢定以重新尋回。一個被遺失且未被找回的物體將在1小時之後出現在莫客魚怪的巢穴。若該生物在稍後前往莫客魚怪的巢穴，它遺失的所有物將會從中脫穎而出，且相當容易被尋回。

莫客魚怪巢穴的入口將附有一個惑控附魔，且莫客魚怪可以在它處於其巢穴且未陷入{@condition 無力}狀態時於任何時候啟動或壓制其效果。任何距離這類入口30呎內，且能夠看見入口的生物必須進行一次DC 15的睿知豁免。若豁免失敗，該生物將感受到一股強烈的渴望，並在它的每個回合使用其移動速度以進入該巢穴，並朝著莫客魚怪的所在移動（目標並不意識到它正朝著一個生物移動）。目標將以最直接的路線向著莫客魚怪移動。一旦它看見莫客魚怪，目標便可以重複進行這個豁免檢定，豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。目標也可以在它的每個回合結束時，或是每當它受到傷害時重複進行這個豁免檢定。
以一個念頭（無須動作），莫客魚怪可以使它巢穴內的水體在1分鐘之後產生變化。這些水體可以變得如同空氣般清澈而可在其中呼吸，或者變成尋常水體（清澈度從汙濁到清澈皆可）。

regionalEffects: 若莫客魚怪死亡，這些區域效應都將立即消失。

legendaryGroup.name: Balhannoth
lairActions: When fighting inside its lair, a balhannoth can use lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), a balhannoth can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; the balhannoth can't use the same lair action two rounds in a row:

items: The balhannoth warps reality around it in an area up to 500 feet square. After 10 minutes, the terrain in the area reshapes to assume the appearance of a location sought by one intelligent creature whose mind the balhannoth has read (see Regional Effects below). The transformation affects nonliving material only and can't create anything with moving parts or magical properties. Any object created in this area is, upon close inspection, revealed as a fake. Books are filled with empty pages, golden items are obvious counterfeits, and so on. The transformation lasts until the balhannoth dies or uses this lair action again.

The balhannoth targets one creature within 500 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or the target, along with whatever it is wearing and carrying, teleports to an unoccupied space of the balhannoth's choice within 60 feet of it.

The balhannoth targets one creature within 500 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or the balhannoth becomes invisible to that creature for 1 minute. This effect ends if the balhannoth attacks the target.

regionalEffects: A region containing a balhannoth's lair becomes warped by the creature's unnatural presence, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: Creatures within 1 mile of the balhannoth's lair experience a sensation of being close to whatever they desire most. The sensation grows stronger the closer the creatures come to the balhannoth's lair.
The balhannoth can sense the strongest desires of any humanoid within 1 mile of it and learns whether those desires involve a place: a safe location to rest, a temple, home, or somewhere else.

regionalEffects: If the balhannoth dies, these effects end immediately.

legendaryGroup.name: Geryon
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Geryon can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects; he can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Geryon causes a blast of cold to burst from the ground at a point he can see within 120 feet of him. The cold fills a cube, 10 feet on each side, centered on that point. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@dice 8d6}) cold damage.

Geryon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become restrained for 1 minute. The target can end the effect on itself if it deals any damage to one or more of its allies.
Geryon casts the {@spell banishment} spell.

regionalEffects: The region containing Geryon's lair is warped by his magic, creating one or more of the following effects:

items: Intelligent creatures within 1 mile of the lair frequently see shimmering portals leading to places they consider safe. Passing through a portal always deposits a traveler somewhere in Stygia.
Freezing strong winds howl around the area within 1 mile of the lair.
Howls and screams fill the air within 1 mile of the lair. Any creature that finishes a short or long rest in this area must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or derive no benefit from the rest.

regionalEffects: If Geryon dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Zariel
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Zariel can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects; she can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: Zariel casts major image four times at its lowest level, targeting different areas with the spell. Zariel prefers to create images of intruders' loved ones being burned alive. Zariel doesn't need to concentrate on the spells, which end on initiative count 20 of the next round. Each creature that can see these illusions must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the illusion for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
Zariel casts her innate {@spell fireball} spell.

regionalEffects: The region containing Zariel's lair is warped by her magic, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: The area within 9 miles of the lair is filled with screaming voices and the stench of burning meat.

Once every 60 feet within 1 mile of the lair, 10-foot-high gouts of flame rise from the ground. Any creature or object that touches the flame takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) fire damage, though it can take this damage no more than once per round.
The area within 2 miles, but no closer than 500 feet, of the lair is filled with smoke, which causes the area to be heavily obscured. The smoke can't be cleared away.

regionalEffects: If Zariel dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d10} days.

legendaryGroup.name: Githzerai Anarch
lairActions: An anarch can use lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the anarch can take a lair action to cause one of the following effects; the anarch can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The anarch casts the {@spell lightning bolt} spell (at 5th level), but the anarch can change the damage type from lightning to cold, fire, psychic, radiant, or thunder. If the spell deals damage other than fire or lightning, it doesn't ignite flammable objects.

The anarch casts the {@spell creation} spell (as a 9th-level spell) using the unformed substance of Limbo instead of shadow material. If used in Limbo, the object remains until the anarch's concentration is broken, regardless of its composition. If the anarch moves more than 120 feet from the object, its concentration breaks.

The anarch can magically move an object it can see within 150 feet of it by making a Wisdom check with advantage. The DC depends on the object's size: DC 5 for Tiny, DC 10 for Small, DC 15 for Medium, DC 20 for Large, and DC 25 for Huge or larger.

regionalEffects: The region containing an anarch's lair is warped by its presence, which creates one or more of the following effects:

items: In Limbo, the anarch can spend 10 minutes stabilizing a 5-mile area centered on it, causing the unformed substance to take whatever inanimate form the anarch chooses. During that process, the anarch determines the shape and composition of the forms created.
The anarch stabilizes any object created in Limbo and brought to the Material Plane for as long as the anarch remains within 1 mile of it (no action required).

regionalEffects: If the anarch dies, these effects end after {@dice 1d6} rounds. All formed substance becomes a chaotic churn of energy and matter, unraveling into unformed substance that dissipates {@dice 1d6} rounds later.

legendaryGroup.name: Merrenoloth
lairActions: Any ship a merrenoloth is contracted to captain becomes the creature's lair. When fighting on the ship, the merrenoloth can invoke its ability to take lair actions. On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the merrenoloth can take one lair action to cause one of the following effects; it can't use the same effect two rounds in a row:

items: The ship regains 22 ({@dice 4d10}) hit points.
A strong wind propels the ship, increasing its speed by 30 feet until initiative count 20 on the next round.

The air within 60 feet of the ship is filled with howling wind. Until initiative count 20 on the next round, that area is difficult terrain, and when a Medium or smaller creature flies into that area or starts its turn flying there, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

regionalEffects: A merrenoloth imbues its vessel with powerful magic that creates one or more of the following effects:

items: The ship doesn't sink even if its hull is breached.
The ship always stays on course to the destination the merrenoloth names.
Creatures the merrenoloth chooses to take on the ship aren't discomfited by wind or weather, though this effect doesn't protect against damage.

regionalEffects: If the merrenoloth dies, these effects fade over the course of {@dice 1d6} hours.

legendaryGroup.name: Halaster Blackcloak
lairActions: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), Halaster takes a lair action to cause one of the following effects:

items: Halaster targets a volume of unoccupied space or solid stone no larger than four 10-foot cubes within 30 feet of him, turning the open space to solid, worked stone or vice versa.
Halaster causes one door or archway within 30 feet of him to disappear and be replaced by a blank wall, or he restores a door or an archway previously removed in this way.
Halaster deactivates or reactivates one of Undermountain's magic gates. The gate must be within 120 feet of him.

regionalEffects: When Halaster is in Undermountain, the following effects can occur in any location within the dungeon or in any extraplanar extension of the dungeon:

items: A magical scrying sensor appears, taking the form of a ghostly, 1-foot-diameter humanoid eye surrounded by motes of light. The sensor is stationary, though Halaster can reorient the eye to face in any direction. Halaster can see through the eye as though he was in its space. The eye can't be harmed or dispelled, but it winks out within an antimagic field. A scrying eye lasts until Halaster ends the effect (no action required).

A minor illusory effect is triggered, as though Halaster had cast {@spell minor illusion} in an area. Common illusions include the echo of rattling chains, the distant sound of explosive spells being cast, a dusty cloak or a rusty helm floating as though worn by an invisible figure, and illusory footprints appearing on a dusty floor.

Silent apparitions of dead adventurers drift through halls and rooms as though they are lost. An apparition can't be harmed, and it doesn't acknowledge creatures or objects in any way. It can't be dispelled but is suppressed within an antimagic field.
